website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for the ability to handle nearly any road condition for a reasonable price. Reliable tread wear.
pros: Grips the road almost like a performance tire, in addition to handling wet, snowy, and icy conditions
Decent tread life and smooth ride
cons: A bit noisy under some driving conditions
Gas mileage may drop a bit with these tires

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought used tires for my vehicle not being able to afford those high warehouse club prices. I had decided this time to take a chance and order all 4 tires online through Amazon. The only reason I don't rate it 5 stars is because the order arrived 5 days late but overall, tires look great at $46 per tire. I had to do some shop hunting though in order to find a good deal for having them mounted, balanced and the old ones recycled. If you have some time to spare, I highly recommend buying as they are a great bang for your buck!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has been using them for 2 years hardly tell they lost any tread. Quiet
customer_reviews.author: JoeA1848

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars, ordered again 2019 February
customer_reviews.text: Great looking tire looks like it will be very good on those rainy days no hydroplaning It’s 12/2017 in anchorage Alaska these tires are pretty good but nothing is on ice. But am very pleased with them. Ordered another 2/2019 . Surprisingly they handle well on snow ❄️, ordered another for a replacement. Great tire wow
customer_reviews.author: Damien B.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing tires from Amazon so I was a little skeptical, but after receiving the tires with 2 day shipping and driving them around for a few months, I couldn't be happier. They work well in all weather conditions and still have great tread after a few months of use. For the price, I think it's worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: They handle more like high performance tire a little grabbing but Good deal for $200 bucks.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the same tires on my Toyota Camry about a month ago. I was a little hesitant about them because of the low price, but to my surprise the tires are very good. The cabin of my Camry is quite again very little noise if any. Now this is only after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's got new tires!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tires for the price. I ran them on a 99 Camry for a few weeks before I sold the car. In the dry they were fine. Didn't try them in the rain. If you're looking for cheap tires to put on a car that's for sale, for the sake of saying "it's got new tires!" then these are perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chigoo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on arrival, grab a bit lol will check back in after driving a few months. Ordering two more, they got here in two days I should have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Get your own
customer_reviews.text: All in all the tires are inexpensive, good quality and great tire. At 540, traction "A", tread wear "A", you will not find a over all tire like this for this price, you may find 600+, with "A", but with a "B" or the other way around and costing way more and not include the installation(which I might add was why I purchased). So 4 tires and installation for under $400.00 you will not find, period!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap as compared to other options. The mechanic who installed the tyres was surprised at the price as well. He assured that these are not refurbished. Happy with the product overall.
customer_reviews.author: AnkSeek

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: I have been driving on them for a month, great price (98 for 2)
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat these tires for the price. Put them on my son's car and it's handling great. Haven't hit snow season yet, but for normal tires, they've got great tread and seem good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These tires ride very well for the price I paid even in the snow. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ajmidd

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these tire in January, lasted less than a year and popped while I was on the highway. Will spend a bit more now on better quality tires.
customer_reviews.author: Mi-chan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable so was able to get better control of car good for the money
customer_reviews.text: On time as promised. Affordable so was able to get better control of car good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Have had them on for a while now, still good tread life. A very nice tire for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: got a bubble after one year, warranty needed proof of rotation etc, dont stand behind product
customer_reviews.author: emanuel arcuri

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely purchase again so worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have had them for some time now and they have took a liking and they are still ticking
customer_reviews.author: sharlyne gooding

customer_reviews.title: High quality, reasonable price.. Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: I got a set of four of these tires for my sister. These tires are high quality at a reasonable price. I would recommend these to my own family. What else is there to say the tires get five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Arliss

customer_reviews.text: Good value for the $$ this tire cost 5 dollars more than a used tire!
customer_reviews.author: conyoman

customer_reviews.title: Great tire just wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I requested 2 tires and received 2 tires just the wrong size. Thy were returned and the right one's purchased. Even though thy were the wrong size thy were one's i would buy again if i had the need for that size. Received my money back and put it towards the right size tires. All is good
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for $43. Not the best in the snow
customer_reviews.author: Doucheon mandick

customer_reviews.title: Good Tires
customer_reviews.text: My car drives better with these tires. I’m happy that I got a good deal with some good tires.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Good tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quite and smooth on dry roads good in the rain, ok in snow. It's an all season tire so not the best on ice. Good tire for the price.
customer_reviews.author: 4XFOX

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire !!
customer_reviews.text: These tires are an excellent value for the money. I have purchased two sets of them now. No complaints ar all. An excellent all around tire !!
customer_reviews.author: Zakman55

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the price and performance of these
customer_reviews.text: Looked around for a decent priced set of tires. Very pleased with the price and performance of these.
customer_reviews.author: josh davidson

customer_reviews.title: The price is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Its a excellent tire doesn't makes all that noise other tires make on the road
customer_reviews.author: MELO

customer_reviews.title: Tire
customer_reviews.text: This tire was cheaper than stores, does the job, and looks good. Will buy again if have to.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ride, will be ordering more for my other cars
customer_reviews.author: AROD

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for in Infinity I30, prefect and great price much cheaper than the tire shop!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: 2 day shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my mazda mpv mini van. They handle well in rain did not require alot of balancing and I will buy another set. Thanks for the fast shipping and great service.
customer_reviews.author: The grill man

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it. I got the tires delivered to Guam, and its a great tire for this island demands for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the money. No road noise. No issues. Been driving on it for 3mos now.
customer_reviews.author: Wu-tang

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 4 tires lasted 2 and 1/2 months only
customer_reviews.text: The tire had a manufacturers defect that it just lasted 2 & 1/2 months. But 3 other tires are OK so far
customer_reviews.author: chandru gurnani

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for the price, great for Florida weather lol they give a good feeling of the road
customer_reviews.author: Adrian P

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Ruined in less than a month. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Darah

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Most tires have edges. This tire lacks edges which means Less mileage before I have to buy a replacement. I won’t buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Guido A Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Have had them for about 2 months now and they're doing pretty good. I have a 2002 Toyota Camry
customer_reviews.author: SullyDoubleO

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 4 tired but only got 3
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four tires but I got 3 only !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One failed within 50 miles. Others rides like the cheap tires they are.
customer_reviews.text: Had a tire fail with less than 50 miles on it. No customer service from Amazon or manufacturer. The ones that did not fail are not bad but not good either. I guess would rate them a little better than purchasing used tires but if I had to do it over again I would purchase from a tire site or shop and spend the extra money for someone who would stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Englehart

customer_reviews.title: I have brand new rim and a bad new tire
customer_reviews.text: They dont stand behind there products, Im a a.s.e certified technician, I installed the tires myself, one of the tire had 69 lbs of road force, I assume i had a bent rim, I bought a new rim, tried to balance the tire again it had 79 lbs road force, I asked for s refund on 1 tire, they said only 30 day refund policy, STAY AWAY FROM FASTLANE tire company, I have brand new rim and a bad new tire, THANKS
customer_reviews.author: bmw tech

customer_reviews.title: great value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire. Using as a spare right now. So no usage report right now.
customer_reviews.author: TONY WOLKEN

product_meta.title: Milestar MS932 All- Season Radial Tire-205/65R15 94H
product_meta.description: Milestar ms932 sport P205/65R15 94H bsw all-season tire
feature_bullets: Wide ribs around the tire improve steadiness, handling, and lateral grip
Angled and longitudinal sips increase tire and tread life
Maximized tread pattern provides exceptional performance in all seasons

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars194 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
